title: How to write an essay about why a good education is right - Quora

response.answer_text: A good essay should have the following key subheadings Introduction : in this section you explore the introduction part of why you think good education is right. You basically introduce you concept /argument to the reader. Body/Discussion: in this section you explore the various subheading that seek to address you essay concept. Conclusion: This is the last part of your essay and will seek to validate your argument on whether good education is right or not.
